choices.text:
For libreoffice calc write an expression to copy contents from another cell and remove all single quotes
To achieve this, you can use the `SUBSTITUTE` function in LibreOffice Calc. Here's how it works:
```sql
=SUBSTITUTE(A1,"'","")
```
This formula will replace any occurrence of a single quote (') with an empty string (""). The result is that all the contents within cell A1 are copied to another location, but without any quotes.
